title: Life After Marriage - Novel Updates
genre: Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Smut
tags: Black Belly   Childcare   Contracts   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Family   Female Protagonist   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Multiple Personalities   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Wealthy Characters
author: 下弦の咒
description:
After a night, surprisingly I acquired a husband!

Well, the fact is that after a one-night stand, I unwittingly signed a marriage agreement. There isn’t a bad in-law relationship but instead a mother-in-law and daughter-in-law alliance.

The purpose of our alliance: Make my husband interested in women!

Frankly speaking, a man who isn’t interested in a woman … is he gay? Having a husband who is suspected to be gay, I will fight for him and not let him go astray.

So I raise my eyebrows and with a wicked smile: My dear husband, wait and see how I am going to teach you to be a real man!>
